title: Sierra Leone greets the Queen
subject_group: People/Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain, 1926-
People/Philip, Prince, consort of Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain, 1921-
History/Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain, 1926-
History/Philip, Prince, consort of Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain, 1921-
description: Royal tour of Sierra Leone by Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II, and HRH Prince Philip, the Duke of Edinburgh, in 1961; State Drive to Freetown; a military parade and inspection, a Royal Durbar, a State Banquet and the Garden Party given for Her Majesty by Prime Minister, Sir Milton Margai. Visits to outstanding industrial projects and educational institutions and a wealth of colourful pageants and displays are other features of the tour.
